item.title: Dwarves Memo
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our newest memos This is where we keep our internal updates, learned and curated by our engineers. Droppii x Dwarves: Transforming E-Commerce with Innovative Dropshipping Solutions: Droppii, in collaboration with Dwarves Foundation, revamps its e-commerce platform, enhancing dropshipping operations with the launch of Droppii for Business v3.0. This strategic partnership focuses on improving user experience and operational efficiency through a new dashboard, CMS, and ERP system. The initiative marks a significant step in Droppii’s growth in the competitive e-commerce sector, showcasing the impact of technical and strategic collaboration.
